name: Multi-colour adventure
description:
Arrow keys to move and jump. This is my first finished / published game. Hope you enjoy it. Because it is my first game it only has 9 levels. Other people's first games are 3 times as good but they were made by adults. I am just a kid. Not even a teenager yet!

Consisting of challenges including fast moving platforms and a couple of hard levels it is sure to be fun (and challenging).

Made in godot.
